info.name: FF Bookmarks Toolbar - colored rounded buttons
info.description:
color folders and simple items in bookmark bar with different color and make them more like buttons.
designed for flat bookmark buttons
independent, but designed to be used with:
style 137190
info.additionalInfo:
2017-08-27 set text color instead of background for emphasized styles
- rounded corners for (text) background doesn't work in current Firefox versions any more (bug!)
- also emphasize javascript buttons by coloring it's border
- add shadows to folders to make them more visible (like a stack)
2017-04-08 fix unintended coloring menu items
2017-04-07 add emphasized styles for folders (green) and simple links (red)
- starts with "("  (always red, see as action button, should end with ")")
- starts with "-" (may end with "-", also multiple)
- contains "+++"
- contains "*"
2017-10-02
- add bookmarklets (red)
- make folders look more like folders (flat bottom)
- more separation between buttons
- use border
- hide dropmarker
- make it work with multirow style
